content.detailedDescription:
at this time i was eight years old and no grown up would believe my story so i just quit telling it until i was a grown man. 

  i was playing with my best friend on walnut street real close to the intersection with church street in danville, pa. in the summer of 1965. i can't be sure of the exact month it occured, just that it occured during the summer months when there was no school. i can still take you to the exact spot on the sidewalk where we were playing because nothing else in my life is burned into my mind like that. i can still see it and hear what noise was involved just like it just happened and i am almost 52 years old now.

   me and my best friend were kneeling on the sidewalk playing with gi joe figuremen. it was early afternoon in broad daylight. we both looked up when we heard an unusual noise overhead. it took about 10 seconds or so for the ufo to descend and hover about 40 feet or so above us. it was a saucer shaped ufo and had colored lights all around it. it had quite a few windows around it or it appeared like windows. the noise that the ufo made on descent was not of any engine known to me and i have worked around jet engines before so i know what they sound like. it wasn't a real loud noise but you could hear it.

   i only seen it for a real short time because me and my friend were so scared that we ran in separate directions to our houses. i went into my house and ran up and hid underneath the bed and shook like a dog does when it hears lightning. i was never so afraid of anything in my entire life. i can't remember how long i stayed under the bed until i came back out.

   when my parents came home i told them and they was nice about it but it was evident they didn't believe me at all. my friend's parent't didn't believe him either and when you are 8 years old it is pretty hard to convice a grown up of seeing such a thing.  i ran it over and over in my mind since then and i can't come up with an explanation. i was only eight years old and it couldn't be attributed to alcohol or drugs or an overactive imagination. the reason i say this is my friend seen exactly the same thing i did. we both have an above average iq and seen the very exact thing and heard the very exact thing.

    that's pretty much my story but i wanted to tell you the reason that we were so afraid is because we thought somebody was looking at us through the windows. it was like the burning energy at a rock concert or a sporting event with a lot of people there and the energy from so many people. it was like there was a bunch of beaty little eyes looking at us to the point it made the hair on the back of your neck stand up. and besides, we were only eight years old.

  i am going to make sure all of your following points section is answered. 

1. we were on the sidewalk playing with gi joe figuremen on walnut street in danville, pa. in the summer of 1965.

2. we first noticed the object because of the noise of it descending to hover above us.

3. i thought it was a flying saucer and it was broad daylight so i wasn't seeing something in the night sky. it was very clear and very big.

4. it was a saucer shaped object that descended quickly and stopped suddenly to hover around 40 foot in the air. things look bigger to you when you are younger but it looked like it was about 60 or 70 yards if you measured it all around it. it had multi-colored lights on it but the only colors i can remember for sure is green, red , and white. i can't describe its motions any better than that because i was so afraid.

5. i never was so afraid in my life and i ran home and hid under the bed and shook like a scared dog. i still get chills up and down my spine when i think about it. i will never forget it.

6.  i lost sight of the object when i turned and ran home at a dead sprint.

  thank you for allowing me to report this to you. i only ever mentioned it to a handful of people in my life because nobody would believe me when i was a child but no one will ever convince me i didn't see what i seen. i am not saying it wasn't something the government had but if the government did have such a thing i can't imagine them keeping that technolgy to themselves for all these years because it was definitely powered by something i have never seen or heard of yet.  have a nice day
content.summary: Seen ufo hovering in broad daylight, it seemed to fly down to look at me and my friend.

content.detailedDescription:
1.In the front yard looking at far things at my street and in the sky with my binocular.

2.It was shaped like a disc

3.I thought it was a plane

4.It was a ovale disc shaped object and it was just floating in 1 spot for about 3 to 4 mins. it was not making any sound or movement.

5.At first i wasint really sher it was a ufo because i was just looking in the sky without my binocuular then i got my binocular and found te object and said "that is a ufo".

when i went to school i start telling my friends that i saw a ufo but they didint believe me because they dont believe in ufo's,and they start saying "its a plane" but i told them its not a plane ita a ufo and then they strt laughing at me and saying jokes.

6.After i found the object i went into a house to try to get a camera to film it and put it on the ufo websites but i didint find one.When i came back outside it wasint ther.
content.summary: Ufo disc was just in the air and wasint moving

content.detailedDescription: It hovered for 9 seconds, then lowered down and raised up again left to right and hovered and shot out towards right then shot out at a high rate of speed towards the left and then it hovered for a few seconds and went down slowly. it did this three times. i was in city of industry and it seemed liked it could be over the la habra or furher south. i was standing in the back yard of a friends home and i brought it to their attention and they saw the second event.  in total it lasted approximate five minutes.  i noticed because it was so shiny like i have never seen before and moved so quickly like i had never seen. i thought it was a ufo.  i almost didn't want to write this because i felt silly, but what i saw was something i will never forget or i have ever experienced.  if some one else had this experience please, i would like to know.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Shiny white light with blue outer color

content.detailedDescription:
I had an arguement with my mom late at night. i decided to let my frustration out on some weights and began to do a few sets of bench in the garage.  after 2 sets i sparked up a cigarette and walked out of my garage and towards the edge of my side walk.  i just happen to glance east and it stuck out like a sore thumb.  3 orange balls making triangle shape was moving across the sky from north to south-southeast. the lights were not normal. the orange balls/lights had zero shimmer.  it was silent.  i could tell it had a triangle shape from its silloute.  from my perspective, the size was about the same as the moon on a full moon night.  as it moved, i heard absolutely nothing.  i've been to plenty of airshows and understand how fast jets are and how quickly they move accross the sky.  this thing was cruising and i wouldn't be able to estimate how far it traveled in 8 seconds.  i was just waiting for sound and heard nothing.  at the end of the 8 seconds it disapearred before getting obstructed by other trees or houses in my neighborhood. 1 second after disapearing, i saw a shooting star from approx the same spot it had vanished from.  (my theory on this- 1. shooting star by chance in the same area
2. it flew directly away from me and i saw it follow the curve of the planet at some crazy speed which made it look like a shooting star..
coolest thing that i'll probably never see again!

here's the kicker.. about two weeks later saw a show on the "aurora" (discovery)..  about 5 years after the sighting, i saw the "belguim ufo" on the internet.  i can confirm, the belgium video is the exact craft i saw..  i will provide a link to the vid..

http://video.Google.Com/videosearch?Hl=en&q=belguim%20ufo&um=1&ie=utf-8&sa=n&tab=wv#

1st video- the triagle of lights were exactly the same as i saw..
content.summary: 3 orange lights making triangle formation flew from north to southeast

content.detailedDescription:
At 5am i ws outside with my boyfriend as he was leaving for the airport as he is a pilot.  he noticed first "look, that must be some type of space thing, there is no blinking lights and it is going to fast and there is no noise for as low as it is, and is to low to be an airplane".
he left a minutes later, i stood outside and went to the roof, i saw the object come back in the opposite direction north increase in a lot of altidude to a star like appearance still moving at an incedible speed then up and disappear.
i was somewhat excited and in denial that it could be a ufo, but i could not find another explaination to what i saw. the object just moved way to fast!!!! and was to low yet to high within seconds to be anything eles.
content.summary: A flying object flying too low, no noise, too fast. then flying too high & fast, then disappeared going up.

content.detailedDescription: While we were walking our dog outside the apartments i noticed a sphere like object to the north of tupelo traveling at a high rate of speed followed by some sort of aircraft with blinking lights trying to follow the object. i followed it across the sky for about 10-15 sec. and then it was gone. also noticed two weeks before a strange object in the sky to the west of tupelo.
content.summary: Strange lights in tupelo

content.detailedDescription: For a detailed report of what i saw click into mesquite ufo on the internet. since i posted that report (june 17, 2008), many people have asked me to describe exactly what i saw. others think that i am crazy. (who knows, maybe i am . . .). to illustrate exactly what i saw in june 2008, i went back to the scene and photographed it from the exact position that i was in when i witnessed the craft. i then superimposed a ufo (the closest to what i actually saw) onto the pic. now this is 99.99% of what i actually witnessed. the craft (refer to the superimposed photo) was about one-half mile from my position and about 300 to 500 feet high. after i first saw the craft, it hovered in place for about 3 minutes. i did not have a camera (i now keep one in my car) so i could not photograph it. the craft was behind the two story apartments in the foreground. notice how much larger the craft is than the apartments (the apartment buildings are pretty good size). after hovering for about three minutes, it departed in a northerly direction toward arizona and utah (note the location is about one quarter mile from the nevada/arizona border and twenty miles from utah). it took less than two minutes for it to completely disappear. while hovering, it made no noise and did not wobble. if i had to guess abouts the craft's objective, i would say that it was interested in the mesquite airport of which is located behind the trees on the far left of the photo. this experience was the most incredible observation that i have ever had. one funny element of this story is that mesquite, nevada is a city of 20,000 people. i have not met a single person that witnessed this craft (or will admit to it). i could not have mistaken it for anything else (look at it . . .What else could it have been?) i will probably never get the opportunity to see another one but if i do i will be prepared with a camera. i pass the area several times a week and my attention is glued to the craft's location in june 2008.
content.summary: Superimposeed pic of what i saw june 17, 2008

content.detailedDescription: Was taking pictures on a nice day of some family, and noticed this when i re-examined the pictures later.
content.summary: In sky - only seen in picture afterwards.

content.detailedDescription:
Happened in the early evening, was stationed at the air force tracking station on top of the mountain near mayaguez, pr.  objects approached
from our south heading north across the mountain top.  sky was clear and dark, no aircraft were in the area.  several of us were grilling and 
chatting will waiting for the evening movies when the objected passed
directly in frount of us.  there were no comments between us at the time; however, it was obvious we all watched them pass.

before we could talk about what we had seen the duty officer on communications watch call on the telephone looking for the base commander or base manager, saying that the duty officer at ramey,sac, afb, just north of us, wanting to know if we were shooting something at them?  the word was relayed back to ramey that we were not operating any events and had no idea what the objects were, but we did observe them.  

ramey ops said that if it could not be identified they were going to scramble the alert intersepters, which they did.  they scrambled a flight
of marine fighters (type unknown), they could not catch the targets.

we were informed there will be no comments to anyone about this until the air force had an oppertunity to investigate.  the very next day the official air force statement from patrick afb, fl, our bosses, was it was
a snark turn around mission.  the only problem with that was our station
at pr was the turnaround command station and we weren't working.  plus
the snark was an air breathing missile and could not outrun first line
fighters.

just wondering if in that period of time there were any other reports of
that type of incident on the area?
thanks
content.summary: Series of  five bright disks in a v formation approx 200 ft above mountain.

content.detailedDescription: 30 minutes before sundown, no wind, beautiful evening. i'm in my back yard working and i notice the object described as mentioned. it makes me laugh when highly educated scientists say they don't believe in ufo,s because they have never seen one. i have lived in the heart of tornado alley for 51 years and have never seen a tornado, does that mean they don't exist. their is no doubt in my mind that ufo's exist, how could they not exist considering the vastness of the universe. i have witnesses other events also, just wish i would have had a camera. the thing i don,t understand is the way i felt while watching the object that i described. i should have been excited, scared or emotional, but i just stood there and watched while it slowly went on its way, and went back to yard work, i thought about it working but that was all.
content.summary: A bright red orange ball the size approx 5 ft in diameter, 200 ft in the air, 25 mph, no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
It was after 5:00 pm, the afternoon of may 14, 2008.  i was outside, taking photos of storm clouds.  i was looking at the view screen and did not notice anything unusual until much later. 
when i decided to download and look at the photos on my computer, i happened to notice an "accidental" photo, that had 2 large blurry objects between my house and the trees in the back yard.  i could not make out any details and decided the objects were probably birds. i decided to look more closely at the rest of the photos and that is when i noticed a disk shaped object over the tree line, in one of the photos.
it took several months for me to even show the picture to my husband or anyone else, for fear of ridicule.  when i did finally show it to him, my husband looked at the photo closely and told me i should report it, that it looked like a "flying saucer" to him.  i showed it to a friend and she said the same thing.
all i can say is that the object must have been traveling very fast, for me not to see it when i took the photo.  there was no sound, like when a jet, plane, or helicopter passes overhead.  i heard nothing unusual and capturing the image of the ufo was pure serendipity.
content.summary: Ufo unseen until examination of photos

content.detailedDescription:
I was up in flagstaff on my day off from work to enjoy the much cooler tempures and the forest, which is about a two hour drive north of phoenix az. my girlfriend and i just finshed eating dinner and we wanted to walk around a little bit before we took the drive back home as we did we took a trail by the place we ate at and started walking down it for a few minutes and started to look at the stars which are amazing up in flagstaff at almost 7000 feet unlike the phoenix area.

about one minutes after we were looking up we both saw coming from the northwest ( like the grand canyon or the corner of utah area) a massive balck triangle/boomerang looking object.. this thing had to be at least 1000 feet wide and had two red lights on it. one on eachside of the object moving very fast. it went from the time we saw it going southeast to the point we could not see it anymore in the sky was no more then 30 seconds.

this objest was maybe 6000- 8000 feet in the sky and made no sound expect a little humming sound almost like a vibrating sound.

when we came back to our car few poeple asked if we saw what they saw and we all talked about it for a few minutes then went our own ways

i first though it was a b-2 but the object was way to big and way to fast and of corse made no sound, i have seen a b-2 at air show so i could say it was no that. but i really like to know what it was i do not thing it was man made. maybe we got it from aliens but i want to know!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
content.summary: A massive black boomeranged object flys south west from the grand canyon area (made no sound)

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at my computer and there is a window next to me looking out over a 9 acre field. i had an eerie feeling that something was out there because this has happened to me several times before. i grabbed my camcorder (on tripod) and started looking to the left of the giant pine tree and there were two disc-shaped objects far out there. just like before i knew if i zoomed in, the picture would be blurred beyond recognition so i snapped a few only after i saw them move in unison back and forth very quickly. i was going to take videos but after i snapped the last pic, they moved so fast to the right behind the pine tree and were gone. i went outside with my camera but they were nowhere to be found. this was not my first encounter, we are not alone. an added note: i keep my window very clean, these were not bugs or dots on my window.
content.summary: Very far away, blurred because of rotation but disc shaped.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my mom were watching the perseids meteor shower in front of our house. we live a good bit away from the city so we have a decent view of the sky. we had already been outside for about an hour or so and were about to go back inside when i noticed a light straight up. i thought it was a meteor at first, but the light never went away. i thought that maybe it was a satellite, but after watching it for about 15 or 20 seconds it began to slow down and almost stop, then speed up again, going in a slight zig zag motion. this was when i noticed another light that was crossing paths with the first light. they were both very high up and looked like satellites do, but moved in strange paths. neither of these lights were blinking at all, so there was no way they were planes. shortly after the second light crossed paths with the first one, they both sped up considerably and disappeared from our view.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Very bright, star-like

content.detailedDescription:
I stepped outside my apartment building at about 2:15 a.M. on sunday morning to smoke a cigarette and enjoy the cool air. something caught my eye and i looked up to see a very, large, black, v shaped object floating over my apartment building and parking lot. it was moving in a south - westerly direction and it moved very slow, no sound at all, it blocked out the stars as it moved. it was about 100 feet off the ground. on the bottom of the object was 4 white lights on each side ( 8 total ). i knew it wasn't a helicopter as i have seen medivac and the presidents helicopter flying over at times, besides, they made a chopping noise and this didn't make a sound at all, none.
i was shocked and startled for just a moment and i felt sick to my stomach but it didn't last long. i wanted to go inside and get my digital camera but decided not to, i didn't want to miss anything that might happen, i wanted to see where it went. i knew it wasn't one of ours or of this planet, we could not make something this large and have it fly in this manner. i was seeing something that should not be there, but it was. i just stood there and watched it float away.
the object floated away and was about 1/4 mile away, when it just vanished. i could see the stars again. after it was gone, i stood outside for another few minutes, didn't see anything else.
on monday morning, i called the local newspaper to see if anyone else had reported seeing anything unusual in the wee hours of sunday morning and was told that no one had.
i was going to report it to mufon on monday morning but hesitated, i went on - line and signed up for your e-mails instead. i thought about what i had seen and if i should report it, i decided that i should.
1 more thing, camp david is about 20 miles or less from where i live and our airport is about 15 miles from here.
content.summary: Floated over my apartment and parking lot & disappeared into the night

content.detailedDescription: This is about seeing a alien, not a ufo.  i saw one alien two different times, although not sure if the same one.  both times at my grandparents house in the country.  the first time was when my mother was putting all three of us kids to sleep.  my mother and i sleeping in one bed and my brother and sister sleeping in the other, both beeds in the same small room.  while watching my mother fix the covers on the bed my siblings were in, a alien appeared in front of me.  this was about 43 years ago, i was about 9 yrs old.  i can tell you now the alien looks just like a lot of pictures you see now, slightly transparent, slight glow, big tear drop type balck eyes.  at the time this happened i had not seen anything like it.  it was not tell my 30's when i saw my first pictur of exacly what i had seen.  it said nothing, i said nothing, i remenber nothing else afterwards.  all i remember was looking at it and seeing my mother working with my siblings in the background.  a year or so later, at the same house, i was playing with my cousins and nephews.  most of the time there were a lot of kids and people around, my mother had 12 keids in her family.  something made me look towards the hosue, at the cornor was another alien some distance, not sure if the same, but looked the same from my memory.  again, nothing said, and nothing remembered other then the first sight.  that was my only sighting on a alien and the only memory i have about it.  the other thing that happened to me one time was at my uncle house.  his house is about 5 miles from my grandparents house, both houses about 70 miles from my home.  i was abruply awaken at night while sleeping in the same bed as my brother.  i woke to something pulling both my feet, i jump up and out of bed and ran to where my mom and dad were sleeping, jummping over the area i knew the person was pulling my feet from.  i ended up sleeping with my folks as i was scared to death, my dad, by far not a senitive person, could tell something was really upseting me.  the next day he even asked my brother or sister if they had pulled my feet trying to scare me.  he must of known something had relly scared me.  at 52 years old, and not scared of anything, i still rap the cover around my feet becasue of that night.  only my mom, dad (died) and wife know about these moments in my life.  i will forever remember and wonder what this was all about.  there are a few other strange thing about myself that happend when i was young, but just had to get this out. has anyone had this happen to them?
content.summary: Although i have seen a possible ufo, this is about aliens? maybe

content.detailedDescription: Around the hours of 12:00 am and 1:00 am i was drive down alma school and pecos when i saw a round brightly lite object in the sky the object was traveling fairly slow and steady it began moving in weird directions after i pointed to the object it seemed to gather speed and was gone within seconds of me pointing at it after a while i saw it again only this time it was lite green and seemed to rush away after a few seconds.
content.summary: Chandler sighting

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work this morning heading east on interstate i-80. i had just passed gretna and was about 4 miles west of the 144th/highway 50 exit. the sky was the clearest it had been all week not a star not a plane not a single cloud just a early crisp morning. i looked up as i was gazing at the early morning sun and saw 3 lights that where very bright. this object was approximatly to my south east(the right side of the road). i am watching this thing thinking well there is offut airforce base and epply airport so its probably a plane coming or going and its just the landing or take off lights. as i get closer i realize its getting easier to see but i still can not make a good enough glimpse to really judge. it is not very high off the ground probably about the height of a taking off or landing jet. now knowing that the base and the airport are further east i am starting to wonder why i am seeing the front landing lights that are in the middle of the two outer lights.Because if they were facing me it would not be landing. right about the time i am thinking is there something more to this is it in fact a ufo. bam one two three all lights shut off in succession. right as i am looking at it. now i am really curious cause if it was in fact a plane where are the red and green lights one the ends of the wings that are supposed to be flashing. i look intensly as i can while driving and i see absolutly nothing no lights no other planes, no jet engine smoke or condensate nothing. i am just stumped. i was in the military for 4 years and i have seen lots of planes, jets, and helicopters. so one part of me says it was just a plane and i just couldnt see it for whatever reason. but another part of me is still asking why did it shut its lights off like that right at the moment i really took a great intrest in it. almost like it knew i had spotted it then since i witnessed the lights shut off i should have seen the red and green navigation lights. again the object was 3 bright white lights, center light slightly above the 2 outer lights. if there is anyway of investigating any flights in that area at that exact time i would appreciate it i did take note of the exact time the lights went off.
content.summary: Saw an unkown object heading east on interstate i-80

content.detailedDescription: Went to spend my birthday at lake tahoe my boat got stuck on a low tide we took all the property out so it wouldnt be stolen. my grilfriend was in reno at work she got to the cabin at2:00 am we talked for a few minites and drove down to beach to check on my boat we sat at the boat dock rocks it was a clear sky no traffic a beutiful night we said she noticed the lights and asked me what they where i said  they where a helecoptor it had 4 down ward lights like the one in huntington beach it was 5 miles away at first sight and 40 ft off the ground and moving at 20mph so it got 2 miles away we both said there is no sound and i got off the rock and was standing walking to see it now it was over me and i searted to jog a bit to get a look at itbut it stayed above me i joged to the pear 100 yards away i steped on the pear and joged down 125 ft to the end of the pear now it was above meall that time but when it shot off to south shore ipointed and said to a fisherman did you see that and i looked at beach and it was morning time thousand or so people on beach we didnt remember it till chrismass time in bed we both started to talk about it.      the end
content.summary: We didnt remember event came back to us 3 months later

content.detailedDescription: I would like to state first that i have not told this previously for obvious reasons. in aug. 1993 at aprroxmately 2am, i was on duty as a military policeman stationed at west point military academy. i was with  two other m.P.'s. it was a really slow night as usual as nothing much ever really happened. this particular night we were out of our vehicles just talking amongst ourselves. we were parked next to the main parade field. as i was talking i noticed one of the m.P.'s was distracted as he was looking over my shoulder and he asked,'"hey what is that?" i kept talking ignoring him. he repaeted,"hey whats that?" i turned around in the back drop was this mountain. it was a clear night and visibilty was excellent as it was a full moon. when i first saw the object it was the size that shocked me initially. it was stationary and absolutely silent it was black in color, the length of at was unbelieviable. it had three huge square lights on the first story the second story had three square lights on bottom as well. we observed it for about 3-4 min. we were trying to figure out amongst us what were looking it, whether or not we should report it, but not knowing what to report. i can tell you for certain what it was not. it was not a plane, blimp, helicopter so on and so forth. as all this is happening the object all of a sudden flashes a light like a camara flash in rapid sequence three times. however, this light lite up the entire side of mountain. at this time we were very alarmed. we jumped into our vehicles and started towarded the object. as we made our way the object the object started moving slowly to my left, then it stop for about 3 seconds and traversed against it's flight path and darted to the right at an incredible speeds it was gone. within a second it was gone. we decided not to report the incident as the military tends to frown on this type of thing. i was so shaking that at the end of my shift i had to call my father and reluctantly told him what happened, i had to tell someone. he calmed me down and then told me his story of sighting while flying on a mission in vietnam. ......I felt better at that point...Check six.....Somethings out there......Wish i knew what
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Huge object it looked like a five story bldg laying on side black in color silent

content.detailedDescription: While firing fireworks from our dock i turned to see 3 bright lights hovering just above the tree line ,almost seeming to be monitoring us .I yelled oh my god and the 5 other people with me turned and saw the craft ,it hovered for about 5 minutes moving slightly at times 3 lights were visible at other  times only 2 lights were visible.The object  then turned sw and began to slowly fly away at this point 3 lights were distinctly visible, making no noise then suddenly accelerated out of sight.The others were scared but i remember wanting to get closer and wanting to chase it but it headed sw through thick woods and made chase impossible.My family and friends were extremely shook up after the event and all but my friend and i went into the house ,we remained another hour hoping to see it again but did not .
content.summary: 3 bright white lights hovering in triangular formation

content.detailedDescription: I was about fifteen years old, and my father, mother, and myself were coming back home from the riding stable where we kept our horses. daddy was driving, mom sat next to him and i was in the back seat. it was dark out, and i was the first to notice what seemed an intesely bright star, but then it made a sudden shoot, straight upwards. i pointed it out to my parents and as we watched, it shot back down to the point it began from. because daddy was driving, most of this was seen by my mom and i. we exited the highway with the windows down, keeping the object in sight as we made several turns and stops. at this point, daddy would also observe. the object would go straight up, then down, up, 90 dg.Left, back to center, 90 dg.Right, and back to center. this went on continuously for nearly the whole time it took us to go from mesquite,tx. to dallas. it did'nt blink or twinkle like a regular star, and in fact, we could see venus off in another direction, and we spoke about it. it continued the movements until we reached home, and was then obscured by the trees. we were completely unnerved and shaken, but later told the rest of the family and friends about the incident.
content.summary: Bright,star-like object made random, up-down-90 degree movements .

content.detailedDescription: The weather was clear with a sleight morning haze and very little wind. my two friends who were already at the carlsbad rc model airport noticed the object in the sky almost overhead but to the east somewhat. they brought it to my attention at 0830 hrs when i arrived. the object stayed stationary without any change in color, size or shape as best we could determine during the time we observed it. around 1030 hrs i decided depart. before leaving i took three pictures with my canon photoshot s110 camera using the edge of the sun shelter to block the morning sun and give some depth to the pictures also. while driving out of the area i encountered another friend and brought this object to his attention. he believed it was a tethered balloon because of his perceived side to side motion of the object. i did not ever notice this motion. i proceeded driving home after a 10 minute visit with him.
content.summary: Opaque white sphere/disc/oval hovering overhead to the east approx 65-75 degrees for the entire time of observation

content.detailedDescription:
It was thursday afternoon, sept. 11, 2008. there were clouds in the sky, various sizes and various elevations. i live in the country and i was returning home from running errands. i was about to turn left (east)off of the main circular road in my neighborhood onto my street which is a cull-de-sac with my home at the end on the left. the beginning of my street is a slightly higher elevation than at the end of the cull-de-sac, about 400 yards distance. my home is the only home on my street. yard sizes range from 2.1 acres and up. at the end of my street there are two white fence lines running south to north which is a horse riding trail, and right past the last fence is a tree line that borders a farm that also runs south to north. 

it was about two seconds before i actually turned left that i noticed an object in the south east flying south to north. i had a perfect line of sight view, because from my position the object was above the tree line and below the clouds. i estimated the object to be no more than 1,000 feet in elevation. the object's shape appeared to be a combination of cylinder and cigar shape. the object appeared to be two tone in color, pewter on the bottom half and silver on the upper half. neither halves were showing any reflection which i thought rather strange since the sun at that time was shinning through a break in the clouds from the west.

as i turned onto my street i slowed down and continued to watch the object fly in the same south to north direction. i ruled out commercial airline (too small), military helicopters and planes (wrong color), small private or crop dusting planes (no wings, landing gears, rudder or tail fins). the object was flying at a rather quick pace, but then when the object was right in front of me as i looded straight down my street, the object slowed down quickly and came to an almost dead stop. it was at this location that i was able to see the craft fully from the side and with much better detail. i had all of my windows down in the car (4), and the only noises i heard were the natural sounds emanating from a country setting...No cows were mooing and no horses were neying. the object's length was about the size of a chap stick held between my thumb and first finger at arms length. i would estimate the distance between myself and the object at less than a mile.

about two to three seconds later the object just vanished. it did not turn left or right, go up or down, or fly backwards...It just vanished from my physical sight. i then drove to the end of the cull-de-sac, turned around and drove to various higher and lower elevations in the neighborhood to see if i could spot the object again. i could not.

sandy nichols

www.Alienresearchgroup.Com
content.summary: Object moving at good clip then slowed almost to a stop

content.detailedDescription: I was out in my backyard and looked up at the stars.  as i was admiring the sky, i noticed that one of the stars was moving very fast from the south to north over my head.  it was yellowish/white with no other blinking lights.  it was very high and looked exactly like the other stars in the sky.  i don't know if the international space station went over head or another satellite, but i'm sure it wasn't a plane.  once it went over my yard and headed towards the north it disappeared.  i'm not sure what it was, i just wanted to know if anyone else saw anything last night as well.
content.summary: Saw a yellowish/white light going south to north

content.detailedDescription:
I'm posting this over a year later now; since i wasn't too eager to talk about it in the public. i've seen formations of big orange lights before, flying stars and recently 3 orbs flying in triangle formation; but this one last year was special to me. the drawing were made right after the sighting.

sighting occurred on may 14 2007 between 01:00 am and 01:50 am local time

me and a buddy saw a boomerang shaped flying object in the clear night sky; which was flying very low over my yard. my buddy saw it first. it first appeared to be a very fast moving cloud. it kinda uncloaked itself and first appeared to be transparent. then he was able to see the small lights on the bottom (which by that time were turned on) and then was able to see whole ship, it appeared to be of a silverish color with a strong reflecting effect...Like a mirror...Like it was heavily polished. for a blink of an eye it recloaked and turned into a "cloud" again, but then instantly reappeared. by that time my buddy informed me what was going on; since i was looking in a different direction. the ship then reappeared near the great dipper. there was not a single cloud that night; so this thing caught our attention. there was a church tower near by so we figured that the object flew quite low (approx. 82 feet/25 meters). the boomerang kinda uncloaked in front of our eyes, and as soon as it had passed the great dipper it cloaked again and disappeared. it had a orange glow at the front, some sort of dome at the rear and some sort of lights (which were turned off) and the bottom. we were able to see it in full detail. the ship's color was silverish and the dome as well as the big lights at the bottom were appeared to be tinted (the small lights described above, where not visible any longer [turned off] ). i'd estimate the craft's wingspan was the size of at least 3 or 4 airbus a380 airplanes put together. the sighting didn't last long, maybe 2 minutes and a few seconds.

i'd like to stay completely anonym for now; but if there are any questions or the like, please let me know by sending me an e-mail.
content.summary: Boomerang ufo over kelsterbach germany

content.detailedDescription: In 1978 i was about 11 yrs old living in sunrise beach, mo. on hwy 5 & tt, by the lake. it was in the middle of the night, i was in my bed asleep. when i was woken up by a loud noise a whirling sound like a vacuum. i looked out my bedroom window - the leaves in the tree tops where moving and i saw a huge disc with about 10 white lights on the front bottom half of this thing moving just above the trees. it went right over our house. scared the crap out of me. i jumped back into bed & put the covers over my head. told my mom the next day, she wouldn't believe me ,told me it must have been a airplane. it was no airplane! & it moved to slow. it was a disc! with lights!
content.summary: Saw a huge disc fly over my house
